helps.text:
Converted & edited by REAL MUDDERS
Special thanx to Serdar & Anatolia Consortium

mobiles.name: head guardian cell
mobiles.long_description: Head of the guardians of this prison is here.
mobiles.description:
This man has been here for years , protecting his prison from being
destroyed.The only one who is not affacted from that evil mage; stong ,
powerful and wise.

mobiles.name: guardian cell
mobiles.long_description: The guardian of this prison is here.
mobiles.description:
A powerful looking guardian on duty.He has the sign of guardians on
his shoulder.

mobiles.name: cleaner cell
mobiles.long_description: One of the cleaners of this prison is here.
mobiles.description:
He is so sad actually crying,and singing you don't understand
anything.Why is he crying and singing at the same time.Suddenly you
understand; singing : now you die!

mobiles.name: criminal
mobiles.description:
A simply criminal, looking with aboring eyes like a zombie!Not like 
other creatures you've ever seen.You hear a week voice like wispering 
but continues : "as you wished my master".

mobiles.name: kwal mage ancient
mobiles.long_description: Kwal the ancient mage is here working on his plans.
mobiles.description:
As you look at this old woman, you see fear in her eyes.But this is
not her fear.This is your fear, your end whaiting you,catching your eyes,
calling your spirit!One a sudden you see hate and anger in these eyes, 
you must have disturbed her; she screams "All of you will pay for this!!"

mobiles.name: disturbed demon
mobiles.long_description: A disturbed demon is here looking for something.

objects.name: dusty fountain
objects.description: A small dusty fountain is here.

extra_descriptions.description:
It doesn't look nice; covered with dust, but probubly you can drink the
water

objects.name: potpie dirty
objects.description: A big dirty pot pie is on the floor.

objects.name: cell guardian ring
objects.description: You see a shining ring on the floor.

objects.name: shield lost spirit
objects.description: Shining shield of the lost spirits.

objects.name: rod ambrossia
objects.description: The rod of ambrossia is here.

objects.name: staff ancients ancient
objects.description: The staff of ancients lies here.

objects.name: cloak divine protection
objects.description: An incredibly glowing cloak is lying on the floor.

rooms.name: The cell numbered 001
rooms.description:
This is a dirty and untidy cell.It is too small, you can see very 
little here.There is a heavy smell in the air.At the corner of the 
room is a toilet and a fountain.There is no exit here , close walls, 
your mind clouds when you look at the walls.
     There is a small tablet on the wall.

rooms.name: The long coridor
rooms.description:
This is a dark and long coridor.North you see the entrance of the cell
numbered 001, coridor leads east.

exits.description: West is the entrance of the prison.

rooms.name: The long coridor
rooms.description:
This is a dark and long coridor.North you see the entrance of the cell
numbered 019,no exit from this cell.Coridor leads east.

rooms.name: End of the long coridor
rooms.description:
This is a dark and long coridor.North you see the entrance of the cell
numbered 020, coridor suddeny ends here.

rooms.name: Entrance of the prison
rooms.description:
You are in a dark and silent room, there are blood on the walls,
and no escape from here.Only exits are east and west , along the long
coridor cells are located to north.

rooms.name: Prison road
rooms.description:
You are walking on the road to the prison.Take care your step, a
mistake of yours may prepare your end.As you remember the tales you 
afraid.

rooms.name: Prison road
rooms.description:
You are walking on the road to the prison.Take care your step, a
mistake of yours may prepare your end.In the anciant times of thera
thera thera was a powerful mage named Kwal.

rooms.name: Prison road
rooms.description:
You are walking on the road to the prison.Take care your step, a
mistake of yours may prepare your end.As he chougt and put in this 
prison everybody thought that everything has finished.

rooms.name: Prison road
rooms.description:
You are walking on the road to the prison.Take care your step, a
mistake of yours may prepare your end.But he got the power to destroy 
the land.

rooms.name: Prison road
rooms.description:
You are walking on the road to the prison.Take care your step, a
mistake of yours may prepare your end.Gods have forshaken him after
he had cursed this prison and people inside it.

rooms.name: Prison road
rooms.description:
You are walking on the road to the prison.Take care your step, a
mistake of yours may prepare your end.Tales continued that he found the
way to the realm of spirits and got help from evil ones of them.
